content.text: Christa had a music lesson every week for one year
Each of the 52 lessons lasted for 45 minutes
Calculate the total time that Christa spent in music lessons
Three of the vertices of a parallelogram are at (4, 12), (8, 4) and (16, 16)
Write down the co-ordinates of two possible positions of the fourth vertex
Write the following in order of size, smallest first
22 metres per second in kilometres per hour
In 2012 the cost of a ticket to an arts festival was \(\)30
This was \(20\%\) more than the ticket cost in 2011
Calculate the cost of the ticket in 2011
The solutions of the equation \(x^{2} - 6x + d = 0\) are both integers
\(m\) varies directly as the cube of \(x\)
Find the value of \(a^{2} + b^{2}\) when \(a + b = 6\) and \(ab = 7\)
Give your answer correct to 2 significant figures
Write the answer to the following calculations in standard form
The vertices of the rectangle \(ABCD\) lie on a circle centre \(O\)
\(MN\) is a line of symmetry of the rectangle
\(AC\) is a diameter of the circle and angle \(ACD = 42^{\circ}\)
Construct the locus of all the points which are \(3\mathrm{cm}\) from vertex \(A\) and outside the rectangle.
Construct, **using a straight edge and compasses only**, one of the lines of symmetry of the rectangle.
Calculate the volume of water in the tunnel
The diagram shows the entrance to a tunnel
The circular arc has a radius of \(3\mathrm{m}\) and centre \(O\)
During a storm the tunnel filled with water, to the level shown by the shaded area in the diagram
Draw the image of the triangle under the combined transformation
Describe fully the **single** transformation represented by \(\begin{pmatrix} - 1 & 0 \\ 0 & 1 \end{pmatrix}\)
\((p, q)\) is the image of the point \((x, y)\) under this combined transformation
the number of green beans that are longer than \(26\mathrm{cm}\),
the probability that a green bean chosen at random is more than \(14\mathrm{cm}\) long
A gardener measured the lengths of 50 green beans from his garden
The results have been used to draw this cumulative frequency diagram
